LogMessage: IS THE CAMERA WORKING FINE? YOU SHOULD CHECK ON IT. PICK IT UP AND TRY TAKING A SHOT.

OKAY. I WILL ASSUME THAT YOUR CAMERA IS FINE. EVEN IT IS NO DIFFERENT FROM SCRAP. NOW TAKE OUT YOUR SCANNER AND TRY SCAN ON RECEPTION TABLE. THIS SHIT WON'T ACTIVE IF YOU DON'T HOLD THE LEFT CLICK UNTIL COMPLETE.
I JUST OPENED THE DOOR FOR YOU. FIRST YOU NEED TO TAKE THE PHOTO OF A HELMET. A SCIETIST'S HELMET. FIND THE PREP ROOM. THIS SHOUL BE EASY.
LOOKS EXPENSIVE EH? THE COLLECTOR TEAM WILL COME PICK IT UP LATER. FIND THE CONTROL ROOM TO OPEN THE DOORS.
I CAN SEE CONTROL ROOM'S GREEN LIGHT ON THE MAP. OKAY, PROCEED TO THE STORAGE ROOM AND SCAN A SCIENCTIFIC TOOL FOR ME.
WAIT. THIS IS BIOLOGICAL TOOL. ARE THEY RESEARCHING THE BIO-TECH HERE? ON THE MOON? I'M SURE THERE'S MORE NEARBY ON THE SHELF. GO FIND IT.
I HAVE NO IDEA JUST SEEING IT. YOU NEED TO SCAN THE ENTIRE SHELF. SO I CAN RUN MORE ANALYTICAL DATA.

OKAY. I THINK WE FOUND SOMETHING VERY INTERESTING. THE SHELF IS FULL OF DISSECTION TOOLS. GET TO THE LAB ZONE THERE SHOULD BE MORE OF GOOD STUFFS THERE. BUT YOU NEED TO ACTIVE THE POWER BUTTON IN CONTROL ROOM.
WHAT'S WRONG? I WON'T ACTIVE THE ELEVATOR FOR YOU UNTIL YOU COMPLETE THE DAMN JOB. TAKE ALL THREE LAB TOOL PHOTO IN THE LAB AREA. LOOK FOR THE ORANGE TRIANGLE MARK.
OKAY. I NEED MORE SCAN DATA FOR OUR COLLECTOR. SCAN ANYTHING YOU THINK IT IS INTERESTING. SOMETHING LIKE THE LAB BENCH.
A SURGERY BENCH WITH BLOOD ON IT? GOOD. I NEED MORE. SCAN ONE OR TWO THING. I THINK IF YOU SEARCH TO THE NORTH AREA YOU MIGHT FOUND SOMETHING.
WHAT THE HELL. THEY ARE RUNNING XENO RESEARCH ON THE MOON. THE RUMOR WAS TRUE. I NEED TO KNOW MORE. THE EXPERIMENT CAPSULE SHOULD BE NEARBY. SCAN IT AND GET OUT OF THERE.
ECHO3 YOU NEED TO GET BACK TO THE ELEAVATOR. NOW.
